Welcome to diag-eff’s documentation!¶

diag-eff is a package for diagnostic evaluation of hydrologic simulations. It includes one main module de. The module provides functions for calculating model performance and for diagnostics.

How to cite¶

In case you use de in other software or scientific publications, please reference this package. It is published and has a DOI. It can be cited as:

Robin Schwemmle, Dominic Demand & Markus Weiler (2020). diag-eff 0.1: Diagnostic efficiency – specific evaluation of model performance. (Version v0.1). Zenodo. http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo…
